headline: Hasbro, Inc. (HAS) “Has Been Up Ridiculously,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Recently Talked About In His “Idea-Driven” Market. Hasbro, Inc. (NASDAQ:HAS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Hasbro, Inc. (NASDAQ:HAS) is an American toy company that owns iconic brands such as Nerf and Monopoly. The firm’s shares have gained 37% year-to-date and have recovered all of […]
